msg.notNoteBook: Failed to get the current notebook, please set it manually
msg.weeklyPathNotSet: Error: Weekly notes path is not set.
msg.confirmCreateDailyNote: Daily note does not exist. Create it?

weekly.pathHint: You can use date template variables, e.g. /Daily Notes/{{now | date "2006/01"}}/{{now | date "2006"}}-W{{weekly}} — {{weekly}} is the week number.
weekly.templateHint: e.g. weekly-template.md — place this file under workspace/data/templates/. Leave empty to skip template rendering.
